mapper.sql: id, create_by, update_time, user_id, sku_id, num
mapper.select: select f.id as cart_id,f.sku_id,b.picture,b.sell_price,b.line_price,f.num,a.subtitle,a.id as goods_id,a.name as goods_name,c.id as store_id,c.name as store_name,c.logo_image,GROUP_CONCAT(e.value) as value from om_shopping_cart f,pm_goods_sku b,pm_goods a,pm_goods_rel_attribute_value_sku d ,pm_goods_attribute_value e,sm_store c where b.del_flag = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 and f.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag = 0 and e.del_flag = 0 and f.user_id =#{userId} and f.sku_id = b.id and b.goods_id = a.id and d.goods_sku_id = f.sku_id and d.goods_attribute_value_id = e.id and a.store_id = c.id and a.publish_status =1 group by f.id order by f.create_time desc

SELECT g.custom_tax_rate,s.id storeId,s.name storeName,g.name,g.icon,u.sell_price,g.goods_type,u.id,GROUP_CONCAT(av.`value`) standardStr, g.activity_cost_rate,g.profits_rate,u.profit_rate,u.supplier_price,u.operation_cost,g.shipping_template_id,g.is_free_postage FROM pm_goods_sku u,pm_goods g,sm_store s,pm_goods_rel_attribute_value_sku sa,pm_goods_attribute_value av where u.goods_id=g.id and g.store_id=s.id and sa.goods_sku_id=u.id and sa.goods_attribute_value_id=av.id and u.del_flag=0 and g.del_flag=0 and s.del_flag=0 and sa.del_flag=0 and av.del_flag=0 and u.id=#{id}

select f.id as cart_id,f.sku_id,b.picture,b.sell_price,b.line_price,f.num,a.subtitle,a.id as goods_id,a.name as goods_name,c.id as store_id,c.name as store_name,c.logo_image,GROUP_CONCAT(e.value) as value from om_shopping_cart f,pm_goods_sku b,pm_goods a,pm_goods_rel_attribute_value_sku d ,pm_goods_attribute_value e,sm_store c where b.del_flag = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 and f.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 and d.del_flag = 0 and e.del_flag = 0 and f.user_id =#{userId} and f.sku_id = b.id and b.goods_id = a.id and d.goods_sku_id = f.sku_id and d.goods_attribute_value_id = e.id and a.store_id = c.id and a.publish_status =0 group by f.id order by f.create_time desc
